```markdown
Audience: Engineering
Status: Draft

Purpose
-------
One-line summary of the threat model's intent.

Scope
-----
What attack surfaces, assets, and components are in-scope and out-of-scope.

Assets to protect
-----------------
- List of critical assets (tokens, keys, data-in-transit, host integrity)

Trust boundaries
----------------
- Describe trust assumptions between components and external parties.

Adversaries & goals
--------------------
- Threat actor types and their likely goals.

Threats, impact, and mitigations
--------------------------------
- For each threat, list impact and recommended mitigations.

Open questions / future work
---------------------------
- Areas for follow-up and higher-assurance work.

```
